unnormalised: Bhāir desant bhonvddi korpachi ieojonn kortāṁ, hāṁ? Vo videshānt guntovnṇuk korpacho vichār kortāṁ? Mākāṁ tumi, mhojea ixttā, videshi poiseanchi vollokh korun gheunk zāi. Tem fokot hem zānnum gheunk nhoiṁ ki $1 hem sadāṁ ₹83 nāsant (unne vo chodd, disāpormonnem!). Tem poiseanchi bodol korpachem pūrem paristhitik zānnum ghevop, fīs Mumbaichea chāvvllantli jīvanāṁ bhāxen lupoil'li āsa, ānī godd dolāv mellouṁ yetaṁ.
normalised: Bhail'le desant bhonvddi korchea khatir iojon kortai, khuim? Vo videshant guntovnuk korchea vixim chint'tai? Zalear tumi, mhojea ixtta, videshi cholnacher tuka zorur lokx diunk zai. Tankam fokot ek dollar hem sadanch rupia teaasi nhoi hench vollkhop zaina (soddllean chol'la tori divsa provem!). Punn te choln xuro korun gheupachi puri poristhiti somzopachi asa, mumbaintlea chollnt kill'leancho ugddas dita tosleo fees lipoun dovorleat ani borea deal sodunk zai.

unnormalised: Udāharaṇāk tumi U.S.ak vochonk āssāṁ. Tikitt bok kel'lem, visāṁ sidhd kel'lem (kherkińńāni!). Āni ātāṁ tumkāṁ USD zāi. Tumī āplea lagichea bankak vochonk xaktāṁ – SBI vo HDFC, tim sadāṁ sambhāḷttāṁ. Tim tumkāṁ exhchenj ret dākhouṁk xaktāṁ, mhaṇje ₹83.50 dor $1. Borobr disotāṁ, nhoiṁ? Punn rava, beta! Bank sadāṁ komishan, kadchit 2-3%, tanchea voir ghaltāṁ. Thoddech vellar, to $1 tumkāṁ ₹85 lagim poddtā!
normalised: U-s-ak tum vochot mhunn sangata. Tiketto buk keleo, visa vevosthit kelem (nimanne!). Ani atam tuka U-s-d zai. Tumchea lagichea bankak vochum yeta – S-b-i vo H-d-f-c, te sadharanponnan tem samballttat. Te tuka ek dollarak teaasi point panch sunia asa mhunn sangtel'. Tem borem dista, nhoi? Punn rav, beta! Banka sadharanponnan commission lavtat, don te tin percent temcheruch. Ekaeksuch, tea dollarachem moll tuka rupia paichasheacha lagin poddta!.

unnormalised: Magir laginchea poise bodolpiāṁk vochpacho vikalp assa. Tumkāṁ tim Dehli ani Bengalur jevxilea xaharānt sogllekodden mellttāṁ, khas korun eirpott sthalāṁ ani poriyāttakāṁchea lagim. Tim bankanvṇem unne ret dākhouṁk xaktāṁ karonn tim unne margāṁnchea voir kām kartāṁ. Punn savdhān rāva! Thodde komi nāṁvāche munx kāchit lupoil'le kharch ghalonk prayatn kortāṁ, vo vaitt mhāṇje tumkāṁ khotte poisaṁ dākhouṁk xaktāṁ! Sadāṁ, SADĀṁ nott porikxa kara, khas korun vodermark, dūri gel'lea adim. Bazarāt bhājiāṁnchi gāddi kortat mhāṇtāt tevhilei vichar korā – apli keemat zānnum ghe!
normalised: Ani magir ek lagichea poixe bodolchea dukanak vochun gheupacho virodh asa. To tuka dilli ani bengalure sarkhea xarant soglleak mellta, khas korun airpportanim ani bhonvddechea zageanim. Tankam thodde banka poros bore rates melltele, karann tankam thoddeoch mearjino astat. Punn lokx divop zai! Thodde komi manache monis lipoun dovortat te fees lavunk xokta, vo khorab poixe ditole! Sadanch, SADANCH notes choukoxi korun ghe, khas korun watermark polloun gheun yeunche poilim. Bazarant bhaji vikte tea bhaxen – tukachem moll vollkhum ghe!

unnormalised: Onlain plātform tezvān thoddes bhāir yetāṁ. BookMyForex ani Wise bhāxileen sait sadāṁ parmparik bankanvṇem borem exhchenj ret dākhouṁttāṁ. Tim madhyasthāk kāddttāṁ, kharch komi karat. Āni tem barik suvidhāi assa – tumi chāy pītāṁ tevhilei tumchea fonache vāparān poisaṁ orddar korunk xaktāṁ! Punn, dilivri kharch dūkhi zaunk xaktāṁ, mhunnun tim porikxa korā.
normalised: Online platformuy pagel'le sarkhem bhair yetat. BookMyForex ani Wise sarkhea siteancher bankanim dita tea poros bore rates mellttat mhunn sangtat. Te madhiasthache poixe katt kortat ani kharcho komi zata. Plus, tem khupuch sope zata – tum chah yetai ten'na telefonaveli order diunk zata! Punn deliveryche poixe tumkam duk divunk xoktat, dekhun choukoxi korun ghe.

unnormalised: Āni ttrevell kārd visrunkāṁ! Him por deshantle poiseān bhoril'le prīped kārdhāṁ assā. Tumī USD vo EUR vo tumkāṁ zāi tem vochonk adim bhorun dākhouṁnk zatāṁ, āni magir hem videshānt debitt kārd bhāxhen vaprup zatāṁ. Tem bājettinchea khatir ekh borem vikalp assa, karonn tumkāṁ kitlī kharch korpak assa ti tumkāṁ barobar zānnum āssā. Thomas Cook jevxileen kompani hem dākhouṁttāṁ. Tori astāṁ, hiṁ kārdhāṁ bhorpāk āni kāddpāk fīs kharch zaunk zatāṁ! Āni, tumi soglle poisa vaparil'le nā, tor Rupiyāmni portūn bodol korop hem ānnkhī mahārg assaṁ.
normalised: Ani bhonvddiche card visrum naka! He prepaid card tuje khoxechi videshi choln bhortat. Tum U-s-d vo E-u-r vo tumkam zai titlem tum vochchea poilim bhorta ani magir debit card bhaxen desant vaprum yeta. Budgeting khatir hem borem asta, karann tumchea kodde kitle poixe assat tem tumkam zannasta. Thomas Cook sarkhe compneo he ditat. Punn he card bhortana ani bhair kaddtana fees ditat! Plus, tumkam soglle poixe vaprunk mell'lle na zalear, magir tem rupeeamni bodolunk ditana kharchoch bhari asta.

unnormalised: Mhunnun, kitench kharachō nirṇay? Āpnnāk gharak zāi te kām kor! Exhchenj ret anek strotāṁnchi tulnā kara – bank, poisaṁ bodolpiāṁ, āni onlain plātform. Soglle fīs, komishan, āni dilivri kharch ghalā. Āni xevttache ghaḍiye poriant ravanākāṁ! Exhchenj ret sodāṁ badalāt, mhunnun bajāracher najar rāva. Thoddich ieojonn tumkāṁ achrjan rupiāṁ vāchonk xaktāṁ. Ugddās rāva, komi dām vāchovn munx komi dām mellounch poddtāṁ...jevhilei to komi dām dolor assa! Borem bhāg, āni khushāl bhonvddi kara!
normalised: Zalear, mull chit'tra kitem asa? Tuchem homework korun ghe! Rates choukas korun ghe vegvegllea jagancher – banka, poixe bodolchea dukana ani online platformancher. Fees, commission ani deliveryche poixe chitrar dhorun ghe. Ani nimnnechim thambeamni ravonaka! Rate sadhanponnan badlot ravtat, dekhun bazara voilem lokx kadd naka. Thodem iojon korunk tum rupia xevnkavunk xakta. Ugddas dovor, rupia vachounk zatat te vachounk melletat... tea rupea dollar aslear tori! Dev tumche vangdda, ani tumchi bhonvddi boreponnachi zaum!
